name: Foreseeability
description:
This app test your power to foresee the future. Probably, you don't have it. Possibly you may have a little. This app is a game to foresee the tenth alphabet or a number.
There are five cards at start. When you hit it, cards increase. When you miss, cards decrease. It is prepared to 25 cards at the maximum, but no one may go to there. the numbers of the cards when you hit are added as points.
